data.lyric:
[ti:Sunday Best]
[ar:Surfaces]
[al:Where the Light Is]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sunday Best - Surfaces
[00:05.55]Lyrics by：Colin Padalecki/Forrest Frank
[00:11.10]Composed by：Colin Padalecki/Forrest Frank
[00:16.65]Ay feeling good like I should
[00:21.12]Went and took a walk around the neighborhood
[00:25.40]Feeling blessed never stressed
[00:29.58]Got that sunshine on my sunday best yeah
[00:34.68]Everyday can be a better day despite the challenge
[00:38.64]All you gotta do is leave it better than you found it
[00:42.89]It's gonna get difficult to stand but hold your balance
[00:47.19]I just say whatever 'cause there is no way around it
[00:51.43]Everyone falls down sometimes
[00:55.58]But you just gotta know it'll all be fine
[00:59.48]It's ok uh-huh
[01:03.80]It's ok it's ok
[01:08.27]Feeling good like I should
[01:12.48]Went and took a walk around the neighborhood
[01:16.78]Feeling blessed never stressed
[01:20.96]Got that sunshine on my sunday best
[01:26.00]Somedays you wake up and nothing works you feel surrounded
[01:30.02]Gotta give your feet some gravity to get you grounded
[01:34.28]Keep good things inside your ears
[01:36.52]Just like the waves and sound did
[01:38.66]And just say whatever
[01:40.23]'Cause there is no way around it
[01:42.90]Everyone falls down sometimes
[01:47.11]But you just gotta know it'll all be fine
[01:50.74]It's ok uh-huh
[01:55.12]It's ok it's ok
[01:59.56]Feeling good like I should
[02:03.75]Went and took a walk around the neighborhood
[02:08.00]Feeling blessed never stressed
[02:12.41]Got that sunshine on my sunday best
[02:16.70]Feeling good like I should
[02:20.98]Went and took a walk around the neighborhood
[02:25.26]Feeling blessed never stressed
[02:29.53]Got that sunshine on my sunday best
data.trans:
[ti:Sunday Best]
[ar:Surfaces]
[al:Where the Light Is]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.55]//
[00:11.10]//
[00:16.65]我该感到惬意自在
[00:21.12]走出家门 在附近散散步
[00:25.40]幸福洋溢 从未有过压力
[00:29.58]我穿上华服 沐浴在阳光里
[00:34.68]尽管面临挑战 可每一天都会是美好的日子
[00:38.64]你要做的就是让一切变得比初见时更好
[00:42.89]振作起来并非易事 可你要保持平衡
[00:47.19]我只是说 无论如何 我们无法逃避困难
[00:51.43]每个人有时会萎靡不振
[00:55.58]可你要知道 一切都会好起来的
[00:59.48]没事的
[01:03.80]没事的 没事的
[01:08.27]我该感到惬意自在
[01:12.48]走出家门 在附近散散步
[01:16.78]幸福洋溢 从未有过压力
[01:20.96]我穿上华服 沐浴在阳光里
[01:26.00]有时一觉醒来 一切都不顺利 你觉得进退维谷
[01:30.02]宽慰自己 找到脚踏实地的感觉
[01:34.28]让自己听美好的声音
[01:36.52]比如美妙的海浪声
[01:38.66]我只是说 无论如何
[01:40.23]我们无法逃避困难
[01:42.90]每个人有时会萎靡不振
[01:47.11]可你要知道 一切都会好起来的
[01:50.74]没事的
[01:55.12]没事的 没事的
[01:59.56]我该感到惬意自在
[02:03.75]走出家门 在附近散散步
[02:08.00]幸福洋溢 从未有过压力
